TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MachineKeyValidationConverter extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase

Docs.summary: Provides methods for converting objects to and from strings.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>. The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext ctx, System.Globalization.CultureInfo ci, object data);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext ctx, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo ci, object data) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a string to the equivalent value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception if the `data` parameter does not refer to one of the following strings:
- SHA1
- MD5
- 3DES
- AES

Docs.exception: The data is not one of the expected strings.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext ctx, System.Globalization.CultureInfo ci, object value, Type type);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext ctx, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo ci, object value, class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a value to the string representation of that value.
Docs.exception: The parameter is not one of the expected enumerated values.
The parameter is not a object.
